name: The Lord of the Rings Online: Rise of Isengard
name_original: The Lord of the Rings Online: Rise of Isengard
description:
The Lord of the Rings Online: Rise of Isengard is a RPG massively multiplayer game developed by Turbine. It came out on 27-09-2011. Turbine published the game. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
You can play The Lord of the Rings Online: Rise of Isengard on PC.
